name: Bigbasket Daily Design System
description:
Bb Daily Design system is a Figma components library with +100 ready to use ui components. The primary goal of the bbdaily design system is to bring consistency and efficiency within the bbdaily design team. With the intention of sharing our work with the world, a small part of our design system is being published with figma community.


Mobile First

Every component was designed to fit well on mobile screens.


Easily Editable

You can easily customize the components without any restrictions.


Auto-Layout

Components will fit your content perfectly.


Constraints

Build responsive web interfaces with ease.


Styles

We have a set of colors and font styles to bring more consistency in your design.
